text: "Right Between the Eyes" is a song by English duo Wax. It appears on the album Magnetic Heaven, and was released as the duo's third single from the album. ==Reception== The song became a No. 1 hit in Spain and a moderate hit in Ireland, Belgium and the Netherlands. In the U.S., it reached No. 43 while in the UK the song only managed a peak charting of No. 60, and remained on the chart for 5 weeks. ==Track listing== ;7"/12" single :A. "Right Between the Eyes" - 4:05/6:57 :B.
